page.title: 10The Arts
page.content: Three choirs give regular concerts in the area:Ffrindiau,a children's choir, Cantorian,an adult,mixed choir and a quartet of singers known as Acroamata. On Saturday mornings during term-time young musicians can obtain tuition at the local High School.There is also a town band which encourages young brass players.The band plays on important occasions and is especially active during the Llandrindod Wells Victorian Festival,an annual event.A flourishing Folk Club meets on a monthly basis.
